channel.title: How do i make myself owner in my 508
channel.description: well i got the server up and everything, but how do i make myself owner on it? i went into the files, and character files, but all i found under my name was a weird code, like ooooo0oooooo7ooooooo8. only alot longer lol, could sombody please help, i would love to give sombody mod, admin, maybe co, on my server. all i gotta know is how to do it.

item.title: How do i make myself owner in my 508
item.dc:creator: @jairusmkei jairusmkei
item.description:
@jairusmkei wrote:

alright i figured it out. i was looking in the right place, but i opened the mainsave with notepad, instead of word. apparently it only works with word. thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself owner in my 508
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

ok one, its 2 cause admin and owner are the same. two, you much go into your login.java and search rights, and replace one of the names with your own.

item.title: How do i make myself owner in my 508
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

You should open you character file and find "rights:0" all you do is basically change it to 2 being the highest and the save but make sure you character is offline. Then logg on and your owner

You might want to add in there Compiling. x]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner in my 508
